result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Jury trial - 12 person on March 13, 2023 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on February 1, 2023 at 10:00 am.

11:23 AM case called.  Attorney Afton Brianna Lewis in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Kate Cook appears on behalf of Attorney Karl A Schmidt in court for Daniel F.W. Lewis. Defendant Daniel F.W. Lewis not in court. Attorney Cook states she was informed that the Defendant is currently at Dodge Correctional Facility. Facility did not connect. State notes Defendant no longer wishes to plead and would like for the matter to be set for Trial. 

Branch 5 Judicial Assistant for Scheduling Trial.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 19, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Status conference on July 7, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

9:41 AM case called. Prosecuting attorney Robert W. Stoiber in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Daniel F.W. Lewis in court, in custody.  Attorney Karl A Schmidt in court for Daniel F.W. Lewis. 
Victim/Witness statute complied with. A  STC is set for 7-7-22 at 3:15 PM (in person).
Arraignment on May 24, 2022 at 09:45 am.

3:37 PM Defendant Daniel F.W. Lewis in court, in custody.  Attorney Karl A Schmidt in court for Daniel F.W. Lewis.  Attorney Afton Brianna Lewis Ms. in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas. Not guilty pleas received by the Court. Status Conference: 05/24/22 at 9:45am for 15 min in person.
Arraignment on April 4, 2022 at 03:40 pm.
Renumbering Counts to 1-5.
Arraignment on April 4, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

(Case called at 1:34 PM- by Zoom) Defendant Daniel F.W. Lewis appeared by video, in custody, Attorney Karl A Schmidt appeared in court for Daniel F.W. Lewis, Attorney Afton Brianna Lewis Ms. appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver. Defendant waives right to personal appearance. Arraignment to be scheduled with Branch 5 Judicial Assistant.

(2:41 PM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Trenton Piltz appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Daniel F.W. Lewis appeared by video, in custody in the Eau Claire County Jail. Attorney Karl A Schmidt appeared in court for Daniel F.W. Lewis. 
(2:54 PM case recalled.) Prosecuting attorney Trenton Piltz appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Daniel F.W. Lewis appeared in court. Attorney Karl A Schmidt appeared in court for Daniel F.W. Lewis.
Attorney Schmidt advises the defendant will waive right to a preliminary hearing.
Defendant advises wants the State to prove the case and is not waiving right to a preliminary hearing.
State notes does not have witnesses present as was notified this would be a waiver.
Defendant waives time limits for preliminary hearing.
Court orders new preliminary hearing will be scheduled and all parties, including the defendant are to appear in person.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on March 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adding Counts 5-9, adding filenames and dates of violation on all counts, and adding additional probable cause language.
Preliminary hearing on February 8, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Case called at 11:07 AM.
Prosecuting Attorney Andrew James Gunderson appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Daniel F.W. Lewis appeared by video, in custody from the jail. 
Preliminary Hearing: 2/8/22 at 2:30 PM.
